price: 6. ¡Y cuántos profetas enviamos a las generaciones que los precedieron!
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن نَّبِيّٖ فِي ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wakam arsalnā min nabiyyin fī al-awalīna
